column4: yes, but none of the big game companies port to linux EXCEPT ID
so u can play doom 3, quake etc. and Unreal Tournament
hi, im replacing my old nvidia geforce graphics card for a nvidia 6200, will i need to reinstall any drivers? because dont all nvidias use the same driver?
The same driver should work, you might have to edit your xorg.conf a bit, but I don't even know if you'll have to do that.
